official-title.#text: To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to expand the permissive exclusion from Federal health programs to include certain individuals with prior interest in sanctioned entities and entities affiliated with sanctioned entities and to provide a criminal penalty for the illegal distribution of Medicare, Medicaid, or CHIP beneficiary identification or provider numbers, and for other purposes.

header.#text: Permissive exclusion from Federal health programs expanded to certain individuals with prior interest in sanctioned entities and entities affiliated with sanctioned entities
